# stylize(image:)

**Instance Method**

Applies the style the model learned to an image.

## Declaration

```swift
func stylize(image: CGImage) throws -> CGImage?
```

## Parameters

- **image**: An input image the model applies its style to.

## Return Value

An image of type `CGImage` stylized using style of the model.

## Discussion
title: stylize(image:)
